title: Crack In The Road Exclusive Mix #2: Mammal Club
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/03/katiepod-copy.jpg "katiepod copy")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/5238-crack-in-the-road-exclusive-mix-2-mammal-club/attachment/katiepod-copy)

Awesome artwork by [Katie Rogers](http://katiejrogers.wordpress.com/)

So a fortnight after bringing you our [first Exclusive Mix](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/4760-crack-in-the-road-exclusive-mix-1-solar-bears) from electro post-rock outfit Solar Bears, Crack in the Road  are proud to present our second Exclusive Mix, this time from indie four piece Mammal Club. Gaining an ever growing reputation around the UK, having gigged with The Futureheads, as well as playing sell out shows in the capital, they have the big time in their sights.

Just over a year ago they dropped their debut track, Put Your Fears In Order, a five minute epic, featuring energetically infused synths and intense vocal harmonies. Their mix showcases some of the groups wide range of influences, spanning from 70’s pop to contemporary house, it’s a brilliant listen, check it out below!

[Crack In The Road Exclusive Mix #2 – Mammal Club](http://www.mixcloud.com/crackintheroad/crack-in-the-road-exclusive-mix-2-mammal-club/?utm_source=widget&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=base_links&utm_term=cloudcast_link) by [Crackintheroad](http://www.mixcloud.com/crackintheroad/?utm_source=widget&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=base_links&utm_term=profile_link) on [Mixcloud](http://www.mixcloud.com/?utm_source=widget&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=base_links&utm_term=homepage_link)

excerpt.full: So a fortnight after bringing you our first Exclusive Mix from electro post-rock outfit Solar Bears, Crack in the Road proudly presents our second Exclusive Mix, this time from indie four piece Mammal Club.
